title: #150: Babes On A Budget with Lauryn Evarts -Favorite Finds Under $50, Beauty Products, Skincare, Gift Ideas, Food & More.
itunes:title: #150: Babes On A Budget with Lauryn Evarts -Favorite Finds Under $50, Beauty Products, Skincare, Gift Ideas, Food & More.
description:
On this episode Lauryn is solo and talking about some of her favorite finds under $50. Lauryn talks about beauty and wellness products under $50 and how she shopped when she was working 3 Jobs and putting herself through school. She also talks about food, health, gift ideas, and more and how to find great items on a tight budget. 

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE

To connect with Michael Bosstick click HERE

Read More on The Skinny Confidential HERE

To Call the Him & Her Hotline call: 1-833-SKINNYS (754-6697)

For Detailed Show Notes click HERE

This episode is brought to you by Misfit Wearables and their brand new smartwatch, Misfit Vapor 2. This smartwatch has it all. Right now for our listeners, Misfit is offering an exclusive offer of 5 FREE replacement straps with purchase. Just head over to misfit.com/theskinnyconfidential and enter promo code SKINNY to redeem.

 

This episode is brought to you by Pure Romance, Pure romance helps women love their lives through bath, beauty and bedroom accessories. Pure Romance's dedication to women’s sexual health sets them apart. To try Pure Romance visit pureromance.com and use code SKINNY for 10% off your purchase.
